biotools.summary: Recently developed technique to map in vivo substrates of proteolytic events. It uses 1D SDS-PAGE and mass spectrometry to globally identify shifts in gel-migration and corresponding changes in the topography of proteolytic fragments.

bioschemas.name: PROTOMAP
bioschemas.summary: Recently developed technique to map in vivo substrates of proteolytic events. It uses 1D SDS-PAGE and mass spectrometry to globally identify shifts in gel-migration and corresponding changes in the topography of proteolytic fragments.
